summary: Project to modify admin panel access behavior (make admin panel publicly accessible without email/password).

existing_features.title: Remove all frontend authentication gating for the Admin Panel so that navigating to the Admin view always renders the admin dashboard without showing AdminLogin/AdminBootstrap screens.

Update admin-related React Query hooks and admin UI flows to stop using admin session storage and token-based admin calls (e.g., getAllOrdersWithToken/deleteOrderWithToken/downloadFileWithToken/getOrderDetailWithToken), and instead call non-token backend methods that work for any visitor.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the admin panel accessible to everyone (no access restrictions).
Remove email/password login requirement from the admin panel.

Remove backend access restrictions for the Admin Panel operations so they are callable by any principal, including: reading all orders, reading order details, deleting orders, downloading files, and updating site content/contact info.

projectName: Make admin panel publicly accessible (no email/password, no token gating)
